item.title: Doodle away !
item.description: I experimented a bit with canvas and paper.js, and made an online doodle app working quite nicely on powerful tablets. You can fork the whole project on github. The trick was to have two separate canvases, one for the path being drawn, and the other for the paths already drawn. PaperScript’s tricky clever scoping is inspiring — my usage of it feels like a hack. Remember to press C for Free Cake© once you’ve drawn some lines !
